paragraph.paragraph: This command stops the execution of a running debugged application.

This gives access to dynamic information concerning the application, such as the current
../30_call_stack_tool/00_introduction.xml call stack and the
../40_object_tool/00_introduction.xml state of objects in the system.

It is accessible through the project toolbar (
../../../../../images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/debug_pause_icon.png ) or through the debug menu.
